text: When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. All of the life lessons from every life are being reviewed by you and your soul group which consists of 12 others who have also been other people in your previous lives. Your soul group is a group of souls who choose to reincarnate a portion of themselves as a spirit which is separate from your soul but still part of it. A spirit is like a grain of sand that's on a huge beach.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. All of the life lessons from every life are being reviewed by you and your soul group which consists of 12 others who have also been other people in your previous lives. Your soul group is a group of souls who choose to reincarnate a portion of themselves as a spirit which is separate from your soul but still part of it. A spirit is like a grain of sand that's on a huge beach. The beach is your soul and the grain of sand that's giving a part of itself to its own spirit is you.

When you die, you appear in a cinema with a number of other people who look like you. You find out that they are your previous reincarnations, and soon you all begin watching your next life on the big screen. All of the life lessons from every life are being reviewed by you and your soul group which consists of 12 others who have also been other people in your previous lives. Your soul group is a group of souls who choose to reincarnate a portion of themselves as a spirit which is separate from your soul but still part of it. A spirit is like a grain of sand that's on a huge beach. The beach is your soul and the grain of sand that's giving a part of itself to its own spirit is you. (<----This last line of the paragraph is AI. Maybe you would find that interesting so I put this in parenthesis. It amazingly understood the metaphor and added to this story in a very relevant way. It was what I was going to write down. Incredible.)

As a soul group, all of the souls debate which roles they're going to play in each others' lives. In one life you may be the father of one soul, and then in the next life that same soul may be your father next. Or say that you are the husband and that soul chooses to be the wife. It sounds very strange and it may make you feel weird, but it's possible that it's true. In one life you may even decide to get murdered by someone in your soul group. Why? To just gain experiences in every life to truly understand what it's like to live in various ways.

(<----Last line of paragraph is AI line.)

So now that you've been watching your past life, you realize that it's time to go back in. (<----AI line.) It's time to chat amongst your soul group and decide who's going to play which person in each other's lives. It's all going to depend on what your soul feels like learning and experiencing in the next life. It sounds a bit like the movie The Matrix but even more profound. The review of your lives has ended, your soul group has come to an agreement of who plays who, and now it's time to create another spirit to go back into a human body and be born again as a baby.
